label: 菅原是善
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (812-880). Father of Michizane. Erudite" of literature and president of the court university. Kanshi treatises Tōgū setsuin 東宮切韻 ("Rhyming Dictionary," partly lost) and others, now lost. Comp. dictionary, Ruijū myōgishō. [漢詩、類従名義抄] "
